properties.description:
This alert identifies when a Conditional Access Policy is changed. 

Handling Guidance: https://costar-group-prod-dev.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SCSP/pages/390039244/General+Incident+Report+Handling+Guidance

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Conditional Access Policy Changed: {{Conditional Access Policy Name}}
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat:
{{Actor}} has changed the policy for {{Conditional Access Policy Name}}.
Handling guidance: Use the workbook "Conditional Access Change Workbook" to determine what has changed. Find the PCN in Jira if applicable.
